abstract.t: This document defines a protocol for sending DNS messages over the DTLS-Secured Constrained Application Protocol (CoAPS). Using the REST architecture specified in CoAP and the security features of DTLS, DNS over CoAPS provides encrypted DNS messages for constrained devices in the Internet of Things (IoT) based on common interfaces.
